pkgmetadata.longdescription: Recurrent Event Analysis Planning for Robust Andersen-Gill Model // Power and associated functions useful in prospective planning and monitoring of a clinical trial when a recurrent event endpoint is to be assessed by the robust Andersen-Gill model, see Lin, Wei, Yang, and Ying (2010) doi:10.1111/1467-9868.00259. The equations developed in Ingel and Jahn-Eimermacher (2014) doi:10.1002/bimj.201300090 and their consequences are employed.
